>
>
> Marauder looked back at lamia, his face showing for a moment a
> surprise and then acceptance. �Ahh yes� he said, covering his surprise
> with a smile. �A minion without ambition, how very . . . ah . . .
> refreshing.�
>
> Marauder led Lamia to what appeared at first to be an ornate balcony
> of some type, one that was positioned on the edge of the chasm and
> that over looked the super heated magma that cooled itself several
> miles beneath them. However as they stepped onto the platform,
> Marauder turned and the �balcony� began to lower itself down the very
> wall of the chasm, into the depths below them.
>
> The balcony came to a stop, depositing them on a level much lower than
> before. The air here was hotter, and filled with sulfur as well as
> other toxic gasses. The hall here was also large, its walls smooth,
> the stone so slick they looked much like glass.
>
> As Marauder led Lamia down the hall, different tunnels leading off to
> other areas branched off as they walked. Eventually they came a large
> outcropping of stone and rock, one that protruded out and overlooked a
> very large chamber nearly 50 meters below them.
>
> �Here we are!� Marauder said as he gestured his hand at the chamber
> that lay beneath them.
>
> In the chamber metal power cables running along the walls like some
> dark metallic snake, each of them connected to what appeared to be
> recharge chambers, at least ten of them were visible - all of the
> chambers appeared to be lit, but if they had an occupant it was
> difficult to tell.
>
> �Each of these chambers holds a soldier that will be link of the chain
> that will defeat the Cybertronians that litter this world like
> refuse.� Marauder looked back at Lamia, �and here we are at the
> precipice of victory.� He said.
>
> As they talked a figure strode across the floor beneath them, the one
> identified as Dirge earlier. He walked to the center of the room, a
> place where many cables came together.
>
> �Soon! Soon, we will be able to wake all of our soldiers, but now we
> will awaken the first.�
>
> Beneath them Dirge activated some sort of control and four of the
> chambers were lit even brighter as power was fed into them. The
> interior of the pods swirled with light and energy as something seemed
> to come into being within them. Then with a sudden blink the power of
> these pods shut down, the doors clicked and then slid open, allowing a
> single figure to emerge from each.
>
> �Greetings!� Maruader called from above to them. �Who are you, and who
> do you serve?�
>
> The first one to answer stepped forward, his movement all aggression
> and force. His armor was predominantly green with yellow on the legs
> and arms. Just the look of him was large and strong. �You can call me
> BARRAGE!� he said, �Because when I lay down my firepower, nobody gets
> up!�
>
> The next one to move is hued in similar colors, with giant insect like
> wings rising from his back. His red optics look up at Marauder and
> Lamia, �You can call me RANSACK!� this one said, his voice dark and
> ominous, �and what doesn�t fall to him will fall to me!�
>
> Another stepped forward, this one hued in supple brown armor, great
> horn like structures rising from his back. �What�s mine is mine . . .�
> He said as he chuckled �. . . and what�s yours is mine as well.� He
> folded his arms behind his back as if hiding something, �You can call
> me �CHOPSHOP!� he said, another slight chuckle escaping him as he
> stopped and looked up as well.  �And you�ll find out what I can do.�
>
> The last one to step forward seemed somehow more aggressive then the
> others, more sure of himself. Even as he moved forward, the others
> seemed to give way, almost as if they didn�t what to touch him. He was
> green and orange with what looked like a horn or stinger that rose
> from his head. �I am VENOM.� He said, his voice deep and powerful,
> carrying across the room, �and I command these soldiers.� At Venom�s
> glance the others, they each nod once and then looked back up.
>
> Venom looked up at Marauder, �And we serve you Lord Marauder, you and
> the might of UNICRON!�
>
> Above them Marauder nodded back at Venom and then the others, �Yes my
> soldiers, this is only the beginning. There are more that I must
> bring.� He smiled evilly, �Yes, more indeed.�
>
> BWAHAHAHAHAHAHA
